metadata.title: CVE-2018-20330 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The tjLoadImage function in libjpeg-turbo 2.0.1 has an integer overflowwith a resultant heap-based buffer overflow via a BMP image becausemultiplication of pitch and height is mishandled, as demonstrated bytjbench.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-20330` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjpeg-turbo-progs - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1
libjpeg-turbo-test - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1
libjpeg-turbo8 - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1
libturbojpeg - 1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libjpeg-turbo package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.0-0ubuntu2.1').
